text: What budget range are you considering for your yacht or boat?
hint: Please think of the purchase price, not yearly running costs.

text: How many guests would you like to host comfortably on board (day trips)?
hint: Include family and friends who may join you.

text: How important are the level of finish and the shipyard’s reputation for you?
hint: Think of interior quality and a prestigious name.

options.label: Basic comfort is fine | 2) Balanced quality | 3) Premium finish is important

text: When do you plan to make the purchase?
hint: Choose the timing that feels right for you.

options.label: Within 6 months | 2) 6–12 months | 3) 12–24 months | 4) Not decided yet

text: How flexible is your budget?
hint: Would you stretch if the yacht or boat feels perfect?

options.label: Prefer to stay within limits | 2) Can stretch a little | 3) Flexible if it’s the right choice

text: In one or two sentences, please describe how you imagine using your yacht or boat.
hint: For example: family trips, swimming, weekend getaways, events, fishing.

text: How many days per year do you expect to use your yacht or boat?
hint: A rough estimate is enough.

options.label: Less than 30 days | 2) 30–60 days | 3) 60+ days

text: What matters more to you?
hint: Choose what feels closer to your lifestyle.

options.label: Economy of ownership | 2) Balance of all factors | 3) Wow-effect and status

text: What best describes your lifestyle on the water?
hint: This helps us understand if you need something simple, spacious, or with crew.

options.label: Casual — easy outings, swim, relax | 2) Social — hosting friends and family often | 3) Extended — long stays on board, comfort matters | 4) Prestige — status and exclusivity are important

text: What are your main expectations from owning a yacht or boat?
hint: Choose what feels closest to your dream.

options.label: Freedom and simplicity | 2) Family leisure and comfort | 3) Entertaining guests in style | 4) Exploration and travel

text: Which scenario describes your plans best?
hint: Pick the closest one.

options.label: Quiet family relaxation | 2) Trips with friends and social time | 3) Hosting events | 4) Fishing and water sports | 5) Traveling long distances

text: How important is the choice of materials and finishes inside?
hint: For example: leather, stone, wood details.

options.label: Not very important | 2) Nice to have good finishes | 3) Very important, I want premium interior

text: Do you prefer motor or sailing?
hint: This defines the type of yacht.

options.label: Motor | 2) Sailing | 3) No preference

text: How many nights in a row do you plan to stay on board?
hint: Think of your longest trips.

options.label: Only day trips | 2) 1–2 nights | 3) 3–7 nights | 4) A week or more

text: Which atmosphere do you value more?
hint: Think of how you want to feel on board.

options.label: Calm and comfort | 2) Balanced | 3) Speed and excitement

text: How many days do you usually imagine per trip?
hint: For example: weekend vs. weeks away.

options.label: Day trips only | 2) 2–3 days | 3) 1 week | 4) 2+ weeks

text: How important is speed for you?
hint: Think of cruising fast vs. pure comfort.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: How sensitive are you and your guests to motion at sea?
hint: Catamarans feel more stable than monohulls.

options.label: Not sensitive | 2) A little sensitive | 3) Very sensitive, stability is key

text: Would you like to run the yacht yourself or with crew?
hint: Some yachts are best with a captain and crew.

options.label: Self-run, no crew | 2) Captain only | 3) Captain with crew

text: How important is privacy between cabins?
hint: For example, guest cabins away from the master cabin.

options.label: Not important | 2) Some privacy would be nice | 3) Very important

text: Do you pay attention to ceiling height inside?
hint: Taller guests may appreciate more headroom.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: How important is the width of walkways and passages?
hint: Wider passages add comfort.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: How important is a spacious sun deck for you?
hint: Think of lounging and sunbathing outside.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: What matters more: interior space or outdoor deck space?
hint: Helps to balance between motor yachts and catamarans.

options.label: Interior is more important | 2) Both equally | 3) Outdoor space is more important

text: Do you expect a generator and stabilizers on board?
hint: These show comfort and class.

options.label: Not necessary | 2) Nice to have | 3) Essential for me

text: How important is cruising range for you?
hint: Long trips vs. short coastal cruising.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: How important is low noise inside while cruising?
hint: Some prefer very quiet cabins.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: Which design style do you prefer?
hint: This helps align with the right builders.

options.label: Classic | 2) Modern | 3) No preference

text: Would you like to carry water toys or a tender?
hint: For example: jet ski or a small boat.

options.label: Not needed | 2) Nice to have | 3) Essential for me

text: How important is eco-friendliness for you?
hint: Think hybrid, solar or greener solutions.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: How important is resale value for you?
hint: Keeping the yacht’s value over time.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: Do you care which country flag the yacht is registered under?
hint: Some flags give tax or legal advantages.

options.label: Not important | 2) Somewhat important | 3) Very important

text: How would you like servicing and maintenance to be handled?
hint: We can coordinate it for you if you prefer.

options.label: I will manage myself | 2) Prefer support from a service partner

text: Do you consider chartering out the yacht when not using it?
hint: This can offset costs but affects usage.

options.label: No | 2) Maybe | 3) Yes

text: Do you plan to keep the yacht in one port or move between regions?
hint: Think about a home base vs. flexible cruising.

options.label: One fixed port | 2) Move between regions

text: Will children be frequent guests on board?
hint: This influences layout and safety features.

options.label: No | 2) Yes, sometimes | 3) Yes, often

text: Will elderly guests be on board regularly?
hint: Easier access and comfort may be important.

options.label: No | 2) Yes, sometimes | 3) Yes, often

text: Will pets be on board?
hint: Space and access matter for pets too.

options.label: No | 2) Yes

text: How important are safety and easy movement on deck?
hint: Higher rails, protected walkways, wider passages.

options.label: Standard is fine | 2) I want it safer and easier to move

text: How important is shade on deck?
hint: Fixed hardtop or large bimini for sun protection.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: Would you like fishing to be part of your program?
hint: Rod holders, live wells, easy washdown help.

options.label: No | 2) Sometimes | 3) Yes, regularly

text: Do you plan to dive or snorkel often?
hint: Swim platform and gear storage are useful.

options.label: No | 2) Sometimes | 3) Yes, regularly

text: How important is a large swim platform and easy sea access?
hint: Great for swimming, toys, and tender access.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: How much do you plan to cook on board?
hint: This affects galley size and equipment.

options.label: Light snacks only | 2) Regular cooking | 3) Frequent cooking for guests

text: Do you expect private showers and bathrooms for guests?
hint: Ensuite facilities increase comfort and size.

options.label: Shared is fine | 2) Prefer some private bathrooms | 3) Ensuite for most cabins

text: How important are separate private zones on board?
hint: For example, quiet areas away from main deck.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: Which helm style do you prefer?
hint: Open flybridge vs. enclosed, protected helm.

options.label: Open flybridge | 2) Enclosed / protected helm | 3) No preference

text: How important are smart systems and easy controls?
hint: Bow thruster, joystick, auto systems ease handling.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: How important are entertainment systems on board?
hint: Audio, video, outdoor cinema, party mode.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important

text: How important is reliable internet on board?
hint: Satellite or cellular solutions for coverage.

options.label: Not important | 2) Nice to have | 3) Very important
